name: Formatta Portable Form File
summary: Learn about .PFF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PFF files are used to streamline business process workflows. They allow users to fill out, save, route, print, and email electronic documents. They may also include attachments in the files themselves.
PFF files are very similar to .PDF files. Formatta software can import PDFs and convert them into PFF forms.
NOTE: Phreesia acquired Formatta from Access, which initially developed the software.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
